name: CL_OSQ
description: This table contains the SmartGroup settings that do not change per contact for each SmartGroup.

columns.name: ORDERSET_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Treatment Day, Section, or SmartGroup record.

columns.name: ORDERSET_NAME
columns.description: The SmartGroup record name.  This is different from the display name, which is stored in CL_OSQ_OT.DISPLAY_NAME.

columns.name: DISPLAY_NAME_NO_ADD
columns.description: A no-add display name for an OSQ record

columns.name: OVRD_VERSION_NAME
columns.description: The user entered version name for the User Order Set override record.
